In the given paragraph, the following disease entities are mentioned:

1. VHL (Von Hippel-Lindau syndrome): This is a genetic disorder that causes the growth of tumors and cysts in various parts of the body.
2. RCC (Renal Cell Carcinoma): This is a type of kidney cancer that originates in the lining of the proximal convoluted tubule, a part of the small tubes in the kidney that transport waste molecules from the blood to the urine.
